select seq_product_pno.nextval from dual
insert into products (p_id, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_salescount, p_category_name, p_upload_date, p_description) values (#{p_id}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_stock}, #{p_salescount}, #{p_category_name}, #{p_upload_date}, #{p_description})
mapper.select: select p_id, p_name, p_price from products order by p_salescount desc

select p_name, p_price, photo_sname, photo_type from( select p.p_name,p.p_price, ph.photo_sname,ph.photo_type from products p Join photos ph on p.p_id = ph.p_id and ph.photo_role='main' order by p_salescount desc ) where ROWNUM<31

select p_name, p_price, photo_sname, photo_type from( select p.p_name,p.p_price, ph.photo_sname,ph.photo_type from products p Join photos ph on p.p_id = ph.p_id and ph.photo_role='main' and p_category_name=#{p_category_name} order by p_salescount desc ) where ROWNUM<31
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where p_category_name=#{p_category_name} order by p_upload_date desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' order by p_upload_date desc
select count(*) from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' order by p_upload_date desc
select p_id, p_name, p_price from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' and p_category_name=#{category} order by p_upload_date desc
select count(*) from products from products where p_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%' and p_category_name=#{category} order by p_upload_date desc
mapper.update: update products set p_salescount=p_salescount+1, p_stock=p_stock-1 where p_id=#{p_id}
